##Our US OpenVZ plans: (New Jersey, United States)

**US OVZ 1**

* **RAM:** 1 GB DDR4 
* **CPU:** 1 Core @ 3.5 GHz
* **Disk Space:** 100 GB SSD 
* **Bandwidth:** Unmetered @ 100 Mbps
* 1 **Dedicated** IPv4 Address
* **Price: £2.30**/m - [Buy Now](https://my.vpslices.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)


**US OVZ 2**

* **RAM:** 3 GB DDR4 
* **CPU:** 2 Core @ 3.5 GHz
* **Disk Space:** 150 GB SSD 
* **Bandwidth:** Unmetered @ 250 Mbps
* 1 **Dedicated** IPv4 Address
* **Price: £4.50**/m - [Buy Now](https://my.vpslices.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)

***For higher specification US plans, check our full product list [here](https://vpslices.com/us-vps).***

**Features**

* 50 Gbps DDoS Protection
* Instant Deployment
* Unmetered Bandwidth
* SolusVM Control Panel
* Full Root Access
* 24/7 Dedicated Support
* 100% Uptime Guarantee
